oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig

Class WlsDynamicServersConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig.WlsDynamicServersConfig

  • public class WlsDynamicServersConfig
extends Object
    Contains values from a WLS dynamic servers configuration, which configures a WLS dynamic cluster.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Constructor Detail

      • WlsDynamicServersConfig

        public WlsDynamicServersConfig()

      • WlsDynamicServersConfig

        public WlsDynamicServersConfig(Integer dynamicClusterSize,
                               Integer maxDynamicClusterSize,
                               String serverNamePrefix,
                               boolean calculatedListenPorts,
                               String machineNameMatchExpression,
                               WlsServerConfig serverTemplate,
                               List<WlsServerConfig> serverConfigs)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        dynamicClusterSize - current size of the dynamic cluster
        maxDynamicClusterSize - maximum size of the dynamic cluster
        serverNamePrefix - prefix for names of servers in this dynamic cluster
        calculatedListenPorts - whether listen ports are fixed or calculated based on server index
        machineNameMatchExpression - the expression is used when determining machines to use for server assignments
        serverTemplate - template of servers in the dynamic cluster
        serverConfigs - List of WlsServerConfig containing configurations of dynamic servers that corresponds to the current cluster size
